title: End of Year Review is blank.
body:
After I login, the loading circles start for a second or 2 on the "Year in Review' tab and then the screen goes blank. The other tabs work fine and no other problems. Tried re logging and switched to an old alt account as well but it had the same problem.

Any ideas or other people experiencing this?

replies.body: This was a data bug that should be fixed now! Sorry about that.
Yup, all good now! Thanks for addressing it for all us! :)
